```js
/* Hello-world program.
 Print "Hello, assembly!" and exit with code 42\. */

.data
 hello:
 .string "Hello, assembly!"

.text
 .global main
 main:
 push {ip, lr}

 ldr r0, =hello
 bl printf

 mov r0, #41
 add r0, r0, #1  // Increment

 pop {ip, lr}
 bx lr
```

```js
/* This is not a recommended practice.    */
mov r0, #0       /* pc += 4; r0 = 0;      */
add r0, r0, #1   /* pc += 4; r0 = r0 + 1; */
add r0, r0, #1   /* pc += 4; r0 = r0 + 1; */
add pc, pc, #8   /* pc += 4; pc = pc + 8; */
add r0, r0, #1   /* …skipped…             */
add r0, r0, #1   /* …skipped…             */
add r0, r0, #1   /* pc += 4; r0 = r0 + 1; */
```

```js
 mov r0, #0
 add r0, r0, #1
 add r0, r0, #1
 b myLabel        /* pc = myLabel; */
 add r0, r0, #1   /* …skipped… */
 add r0, r0, #1   /* …skipped… */
myLabel:
 add r0, r0, #1
```

```js
 bl myLabel    /* lr = pc; pc = myLabel; */
```

```js
 mov r0, #0         /* r0 = 0;                     */
 bl addFourtyTwo    /* lr = pc; pc = addFourtyTwo; */
 sub r0, r0, #3     /* r0 = r0 - 3;                */

addFourtyTwo:
 add r0, r0, #42    /* r0 = r0 + 42;               */
 bx lr              /* pc = lr;                    */
```

```js
 cmp   r1, r2     /* cpsr = compare(r1, r2);    */
 moveq r1, #10    /* if (eq(cpsr)) { r1 = 10; } */
 mov   r2, #20    /* r2 = 20;                   */
 moval r3, #20    /* r3 = 20;                   */
 movne r4, #30    /* if (ne(cpsr)) { r4 = 30; } */
```

```js
.data
 hello:
 .string "Hello, assembly!"

.text
 .global main
 main:
 push {ip, lr}

 ldr r0, =hello
 …
```

```js
hello:
 .string "Hello, assembly!"

.global main
main:
 push {ip, lr}

 ldr r0, =hello
 bl printf

 mov r0, #41
 add r0, r0, #1

 pop {ip, lr}
 bx lr
```

```js
.global main
main:
 .word 0xE3A0002A /* Same as `mov r0, #42` */
 bx lr
```

```js
 ldr r1, =myWord    /* r1 = myWord */
 ldr r0, [r1]       /* r0 = M[r1]  */
```

```js
 ldr r1, =temporaryWord    /* r1 = temporaryWord; */
 ldr r1, [r1]              /* r1 = M[r1]; */
 …

temporaryWord:
 .word 42
```

```js
 ldr r1, =myArray       /* r1 = myArray;   */
 ldr r0, [r1, #8]       /* r0 = M[r1 + 8]; */
```

```js
 sub sp, sp, #16
 str r0, [sp, #0]
 str r1, [sp, #4]
 str r2, [sp, #8]
 str r3, [sp, #12]
```

```js
 mov r0, #50
 mov r1, #60
 push {r0, r1}   // 50 and 60 go on stack
 mov r0, #10     // 10, 20, 30, 40 go in registers
 mov r1, #20
 mov r2, #30
 mov r3, #40
 bl f            // The actual call
 add sp, sp, #8  // Deallocate 2 words of stack
```

```js
addFourtyTwo:
 add r0, r0, #42
 bx lr
```

```js
.global main
main:
 push {ip, lr}
 ldr r0, =hello
 bl printf
 mov r0, #41
 add r0, r0, #1
 pop {ip, lr}
 bx lr
```

```js
.global main
main:
 push {fp, lr}  // Function's
 mov fp, sp     // prologue
 …
 mov sp, fp     // Function's
 pop {ip, lr}   // epilogue
 bx lr          //
```

```js
 mov sp, fp     // Function's
 pop {ip, pc}   // epilogue
```

```js
.global main
main:
 push {ip, lr}     // Prologue

 mov r0, #4        // Allocate four
 bl malloc         // bytes (one word)

 mov r3, #42       // Store 42 into
 str r3, [r0, #0]  // that word

 bl free           // Free/deallocate

 pop {ip, pc}      // Epilogue
```
